function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Building guidelines may not prioritize occupant health","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Incorporate strict health and safety guidelines into building standards","Technologies":"Sensor-based monitoring systems for air quality and sanitation","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building professionals, health and safety experts"},{"Description":"Limited adoption of health-focused building standards","Impact":"Inadequate protection of occupant health from contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and incentivize adoption of health-focused building standards","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, financial incentives for certification","People":"Building owners, developers, regulatory bodies","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Low certification numbers for health-focused building standards","Impact":"Reduced number of buildings with health-focused features and certifications","Mitigation":"Promote the benefits of health-focused building standards and streamline certification processes","Technologies":"Marketing campaigns, streamlined certification platforms","People":"Architects, engineers, building owners","Owner":"Industry organizations, certification bodies"}]}
